quote: There lay certitude; there, in the daily round.  All the rest hung on mere threads and trivial contingencies; you couldn't waste your time on it. The thing was to do your job as it should be done.
quote_letters: THERE LAY CERTITUDE THERE IN THE DAILY ROUND  ALL THE REST HUNG ON MERE THREADS AND TRIVIAL CONTINGENCIES YOU COULDNT WASTE YOUR TIME ON IT THE THING WAS TO DO YOUR JOB AS IT SHOULD BE DONE
